sen.j: 石上皇子（いそのかみおうじ・いそのかみのみこ。生没年不詳)
sen.e: Prince Isonokami (Isonokami no oji・Isonokami no miko)
sen.cmt: 原文の読みを入れました。
sen.e: Prince Isonokami (Also pronounced Isonokami no oji, Isonokami no miko [date of birth and death unknown])
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外処理表現を変えました。原文に「生没年不詳」追加

sen.j: 石上皇子は飛鳥時代の皇族。
sen.e: (date of birth and death unknown) was in the Imperial family in the Asuka period.
He was a member of the Imperial family in the Asuka period (date of birth and death unknown).
sen.cmt: セルが分割されているので、主語を加えて書き直しました。
sen.e: Prince Isonokami was a member of the Imperial family in the Asuka period.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外処理原文に「石上皇子」追加

sen.e: His name was written Isonokami no miko (石上王) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
His name was written Isonokami no miko (石上王) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
His name was written Isonokami no miko (石上王) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
